name: Ninetales
description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.effect: During hail, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.effect: The weather changes to hail when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, drought, or sand stream are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.
